chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Lord Dobraine Taborwin, p. 74 (72)—Cairienin lord. He is the High Seat of House Taborwin, and commanded the troops Perrin led to Dumai's Wells. He is little taller than Min, and has dark eyes and gray hair. He keeps the front of his head shaved, and keeps the gray hair on the sides to his shoulders. He rules Cairhien in Rand's absence, and serves as his advisor in his presence.
